4 takeaways from the aftermath of Trump’s guilty verdict, The country has entered a fraught phase. It’s already getting ugly, and that shows no sign of ceasing.

Why a Trump lawyer’s prison reference was so ‘outrageous’, Trump lawyer Todd Blanche in his closing argument made a conspicuous reference to the jury sending Trump to prison. Not only are such things not allowed, but Blanche had been explicitly told not to say it.

For Hunter Biden, a dramatic day with his brother’s widow led to charges, Six years ago, Hallie Biden threw out a gun that prosecutors say Hunter Biden bought improperly. His trial starts Monday.

Trump verdict vindicates N.Y. prosecutor who quietly pursued a risky path, Manhattan District Attorney Alvin Bragg made history with a legal case that federal prosecutors opted not to bring against former president Donald Trump.
